CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 7, 1956, pg. 3 reads: "In Their Easter Bonnets...and pretty frocks, too, these darling little girls paraded their spring finery at a fashion review at A. Leo Weil School. Some wore quilted skirts and toppers while others preferred sheer dressy frocks.  Left to right: ...Marlene Breedlove..."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Marlene Breedlove modeling light colored polka dot dress with ruffled v on bodice, and ankle socks, holding purse, standing on stage in A. Leo Weil School for Easter fashion show
CatSubject_tab: Girls--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Auditoriums--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.A. Leo Weil Elementary School (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Fashion models--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
